name: Swooping Justice
storyline:
You must perform tasks, level by level, to prove to the elder Magpies that you are worthy of their tribe of vigilantes.
The shaved apes of this world can't seem to bring justice themselves, so these courageous magpies must!

A beautifully detailed, pixel art world that includes an aerial map of Melbourne and it's surrounds, linking multiples levels and challenges.
Featuring encounters with many comical characters, each providing trials as you journey throughout your world, uncovering as you go, a comical, surprisingly unique story.
summary: A humorous tongue in cheek action-adventure game. You're an Australian magpie, swooping and pooping on societies wrong doers. Inconsiderate parking inspectors, abusive cops, corrupt politicians, scooter and roller blade kids at skate parks, drop bears... the list goes on!

videos.name: Dev Diary
videos.title: Nostalgic Artwork for a Pixel Art Jam
